DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety effectiveness ACH-0144471 currently untreated patient PNH .
DOC.brief_title: A Treatment Study ACH-0144471 Patients With Paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria ( PNH )
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 18 year older Currently untreated PNH patient PNH Type III erythrocyte and/or granulocyte clone size ≥ 10 % anemia ( Hgb < 12g/dL ) adequate reticulocytosis ( determined investigator ) Lactate dehydrogenase ( LDH ) ≥ 1.5X upper limit normal ( ULN ) Platelets ≥ 50,000/uL without need platelet transfusion Documentation vaccination N. meningitidis ( quadrivalent ACWY serogroup B ) , H. influenza , S. pneumoniae , willingness receive vaccination screen period Negative pregnancy test females prior dose throughout study History major organ transplant ( e.g. , heart , lung , kidney , liver ) hematopoietic stem cell/marrow transplant Patients receive another investigational agent within 30 day 5 halflives investigational agent prior study entry , whichever great Patients receive eculizumab dose interval within past 75 day study entry Patients know suspected complement deficiency Patients active bacterial infection clinically significant active viral infection , body temperature > 38°C , evidence infection Day 1 , history febrile illness within 14 day prior first study drug administration History meningococcal infection , firstdegree relative household contact history meningococcal infection Females pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant study within 90 day study drug administration patient female partner pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant study within 90 day study drug administration
